com.tokelon.toktales.core.game.state

Interface IGameStateInput

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IInputConsumer, IInputRegistration
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IAndroidGameStateInput, IDesktopGameStateInput
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AndroidGameStateInput, DesktopGameStateInput

    public interface IGameStateInput
extends IInputConsumer
    Convenience way of gamestate input handing. You can register your platform dependent input callbacks here.
    This object will usually be implemented as a platform dependent extension. (ex. IDesktopGameStateInput)

    Per default the IGameStateControl will request this object and check whether it is compatible to the running platform. If it is, it will invoke the standard callback methods provided by the extensions.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.tokelon.toktales.core.engine.input.IInputConsumer

        IInputConsumer.IInputConsumerFactory
